nodes.text: Mentors were Dathomiri Witches who were capable of teaching spells to Initiates. Mentors could be any Witch that had knowledge of the spell; even Initiates could be referred to as Mentors if they were called upon to teach a fellow student a spell they had learned. Generally, Mentors taught one spell at a time to an Initiate during the Time of Learning. However, it was possible for a Mentor to teach multiple spells to an Initiate at the same time.
